def_cn: （基督教的）圣灵降临节（复活节后第7个星期日）
def_en: Pen- tecost is a Christian festival that takes place on the seventh Sunday after Easter and celebrates the sending of the Holy Spirit to the first followers of Christ.

def_cn: （犹太教的）五旬节（逾越节后第50天举行的庆祝丰收的节日）
def_en: Pentecost is a Jewish festival that takes place 50 days after Passover and celebrates the harvest.
